item.title: About Nick Buraglio
item.description: This siteÂ is maintained by the domain owner, me, Nick Buraglio. It is intended to be a journal and notebook for things I find useful, problems I’m working on or general technology rambling. It should be noted, however, that these pages are really just a personal notebook to me, stuff I find useful and things I may want to remember. Please don’t expect them to always be correct or complete .
